Detailed Description

Http service object The Http service is managed by a single service object.

API Stability:
Evolving
See also:
Http HttpConn HttpServer httpCreate httpCreateSecret httpGetContext httpGetDateString httpSetContext httpSetDefaultHost httpSetDefaultPort httpSetProxy

Function Documentation

Http* httpCreate ( MprCtx  ctx  ) 

Create a Http connection object.

Description:
Create a new http connection object. This creates an object that can be initialized and then used with mprHttpRequest. Destroy with mprFree.
Parameters:
ctx Any memory allocation context created by MprAlloc
Returns:
A newly allocated HttpConn structure. Caller must free using mprFree.

void httpSetProxy ( Http *  http,
cchar *  host,
int  port 
)

Define a Http proxy host to use for all client connect requests.

Description:
Define a http proxy host to communicate via when accessing the net.
Parameters:
http Http object created via httpCreate
host Proxy host name or IP address
port Proxy host port number.
